unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Movie buffs, get your chai ready! The film festival season is officially ON!
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Movie buffs, get your chai ready! The film festival season is officially O N!

unnormalised: First up, we've got whispers about the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival making a comeback with a bang! Dates haven't dropped yet, but insiders are hinting at a celebration of regional cinema this year. Think Malayalam flicks, Tamil thrillers, and maybe even a sneak peek at some upcoming Bollywood blockbusters.
normalised: First up, we've got whispers about the J-i-o M-a-m-i Mumbai Film Festival making a comeback with a bang! Dates haven't dropped yet, but insiders are hinting at a celebration of regional cinema this year. Think Malayalam flicks, Tamil thrillers, and maybe even a sneak peek at some upcoming Bollywood blockbusters.

unnormalised: Speaking of regional cinema, the International Film Festival of Kerala (IFFK) is already generating buzz. Expect long queues and intense discussions over biryani and films! And don’t forget the excitement around the Kolkata International Film Festival later this year.
normalised: Speaking of regional cinema, the International Film Festival of Kerala (I-F-F-K) is already generating buzz. Expect long queues and intense discussions over biryani and films! And don’t forget the excitement around the Kolkata International Film Festival later this year.

unnormalised: But that's not all, folks! Several smaller, independent film festivals are popping up all over the country, providing a platform for budding filmmakers. Keep an eye out for announcements near you – you might just discover the next Anurag Kashyap! So grab your popcorn, settle in, and prepare to be entertained! Also, the International Film Festival of India(IFFI) in Goa will be held around Nov 2024 as planned. Get booking!
normalised: But that's not all, folks! Several smaller, independent film festivals are popping up all over the country, providing a platform for budding filmmakers. Keep an eye out for announcements near you – you might just discover the next Anurag Kashyap! So grab your popcorn, settle in, and prepare to be entertained! Also, the International Film Festival of India (I-F-F-I) in Goa will be held around november two thousand and twenty four as planned. Get booking!
